itunes:title: Freestyle "Blursday" Meets Dirt Dishing
title: Freestyle "Blursday" Meets Dirt Dishing
description:
EPISODE 17.  Freestyle "Blursday" Meets Dirt Dishing
We're sipping Dry Farm Wine sparkling white and sharing what's taking place in our gardens.   One of us lives in a desert, the other by the Great Lakes so there's plenty of notes to compare.   We're foraging for spring delicacies,  starting dahlia tubers, ordering new trees, AND turning down the NOISE so we can enjoy the gardens even more.   Come get your fingernails dirty with us again!

Our LOVE comment this week is from:

Fraennie on Instagram: “Hi from Germany! I just wanted to tell you girls that I love your podcast. I’m listening to the newest right now and this really makes my day. Like now I am drinking my coffee and getting ready for the day. Putting on some red lipstick, just because I can want to! And I just feel so inspired and like I found my people. None of my friends or family is so much into gardening or farming like me. You just inspired me to make my dream of my own farm one really come true and get it done and do some small steps now! I don’t know what to say but THANK YOU so much for the peek into your life and thoughts, I really enjoy it.”

Our Fab Advertisers!

What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic 

Dry Farm Wines curates only the highest quality natural wines from small, sustainable family farms that meet our strict standard of health. Unlike today's commercialized and processed wines, this is real wine. Nothing added, nothing removed.   We LOVE that now SO many of you of sipping what WE'RE sipping!

Pure, artisanal, and deliciously clean.

  • Sugar-Free (< 1g/L)
  •  Lower Sulfites (< 75ppm)
  •  Lower Alcohol (< 12.5%)
  •  Mycotoxin/Mold-Free
  •  No Industrial Additives

Sleep Chic!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20

Sleep fabulous this spring in your new “modern vintage” sheets.   Woven to last and feel fabulous. A percale weave which is a traditional one-yarn-over and one-yarn-under results in a very structurally sound, long-wearing fabric that is resistant to pilling. It has a crisp, yet soft, feel and allows more air to pass through it, providing a 'cool' sleep on warm nights and a 'warm' sleep on cool nights. This is the same weave used in most luxury hotel bedding and the quality heirloom sheets your grandparents used

We're wearing RED WINE by Toups and Co.   
"Soup with a T, plural":)    Toups and Co. Toups and Co. is an organic, sustainable, all-natural makeup company owned by our friends Emilie and Trent.  Organic skin care and a variety of clean, non-toxic makeup products like mineral foundation, beautiful blushes, concealers, mascara, and even red lipstick (you must try the RED WINE color!). Head on over to Toups and Co. (that’s t-o-u-p-s) and use coupon code HOMEMAKER to get a 10% discount just for being a Homemaker Chic listener. We love Toups and Co.’s natural skincare and makeup and trust that you will too! Tell Emilie we sent you! 

Patreon Love: A massive thank you to our Patrons over on Patreon www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast. Patreon is a way that you can show your love for our podcast by contributing $5 or $10/month and in return, we’re going to show OUR love with a digital copy of each of our cookbooks, along with a LIVE ZOOM call with us each month and some extra conversation, bonuses episodes and more. We appreciate all of our patrons!
